mapper.select: select -- 按照用户角色分组、以用户收藏数倒序排序 row_number() over (partition by role order by bookmarkNumber desc) as ranking, role, bookmarkNumber, userName from ( -- 获取所有用户收藏的网页数，用户名及其角色 select count(b.user_name) bookmarkNumber, b.user_name as userName, u.role as role from bookmark b inner join user u on b.user_name = u.user_name where b.is_deleted = 0 and u.is_deleted = 0 group by userName, role ) t -- 最终的排序，按照 admin, user, guest 的角色顺序排序，角色相等的情况下按照收藏数倒序排序 order by case when role = 'guest' then 0 when role = 'user' then 1 else 2 end desc, bookmarkNumber desc;

select id, user_name, `password`, creation_time, `role` from user where is_deleted = 0 order by creation_time desc
limit #{from}, #{size}

select u.id, u.user_name, u.creation_time as createTime, role, count(b.id) as bookmarkNumber from user u left join bookmark b on u.user_name = b.user_name and b.is_deleted = 0 where u.user_name like concat(#{keyword}, '%') and u.is_deleted = 0 group by u.id, u.user_name, u.creation_time, role order by bookmarkNumber desc;
select count(*) from user where user_name like concat(#{keyword}, '%') and is_deleted = 0;
